MergeResults.query: select "SOMUserId", "UniqueIntegrationId", "PurgeAction" from static."OMUserPurge" where "SOMUserId" ilike '%{{TestUniqueIntegrationId}}%' and "PurgeScheduled" is not null and "PurgeCompleted" is not null order by "SOMUserId" asc
select count(*) "count" from static."OMUserPurge" up join static."OMUser" u on up."SOMUserId" = u."SOMUserId" where u."DataProtected" is null or 'FALSE'
select "SOMUserId", "SOMRegionId", "Status", "DataProtected" from static."OMUser" where "SOMRegionId" = 'FX' and "SOMUserId" ilike '%{{TestUniqueIntegrationId}}%'  order by "SOMUserId" asc

select "TableName", "ColumnName", "Operation", "OldValue" from static."OMAudit" where "TableName" = 'OMUser' and "Operation" = 'Delete' and "OldValue" ilike '%FX%{{TestUniqueIntegrationId}}%' order by "OldValue" asc
select "TableName", "ColumnName", "Operation", "Parent" from static."OMAudit" where "TableName" = 'OMUser' and "Operation" in ('Add','Update') and "Parent" ilike '%FX%{{TestUniqueIntegrationId}}%'
